data.message: Happy Birthday My lovely marshall mathers aka eminem,slim shady,brabbit i love you wish you health first of all and love cuz i never forgoten you my guardian angel your music is still in my soul and will remain forever withought you my life would be misarble in the darkness your my light in my sight i will be forever one of your biggest fan stan shady soldier even if i never seen you live ive met you through your beautiful awesome music my favorite rapper boo , wish one day to see you , hope the best for you and your family have fun my libra and come to greece for a show i made this video for you for this special day for my special rapper to be born on this day and every 17 october im always there for you and never let you down keep blasting those bombs im waiting for you new comeback songs , album , movie whatever it is from you i love youuuuuuuuuuuu peace one love and have s blast celebration
